name: Boxmeup
body:
## Benefits * Create containers and give them meaningful names to find them later through a list. * Search all of your containers for a specific item to find where it is physically located. * Add locations for containers to know their position in the world. * Print and scan QR codes with labels to place on your containers. Scanning the QR code with a smart phone will pull up the manifest of the contents of the container. * Android application allows scanning QR codes and product barcodes for simplistic item adding. (iOS app in the works) * Public API to have external application access and modify containers and items. ## Road Map
Version Description
1.0 Current version.
1.1 Add more functionality to public API
## API Documentation [View the Boxmeup API Documentation Wiki](https://github.com/cjsaylor/Boxmeup/wiki/API-Documentation)
tagline: Web and mobile application to help keep track of stuff
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
